headline: This Law Could End Mass Incarceration
abstract: The New York law has been on the books for less than a month and already the critics are on the attack.
lead_paragraph: Since bail reform began in New York on Jan. 1, opponents have been hard at work to create a backlash against the new law, sometimes wrongly blaming it for the commission of crimes by people they say should have been jailed for earlier offenses, and warning of broad danger to the public.
